usps.usp_description: Users control applications and data; ICP's access control prevents any single party from making changes without user consent.
ICP provably guarantees the integrity of the protocol and applications running on it, even if some node machines are malicious.
ICP apps are verifiableâ€”node-signed results ensure users can trust code behavior and data integrity, assuming honest majority.
ICP stays online and secure even during outages or failures, thanks to a fault-tolerant, decentralized protocol run by globally distributed, independent nodes.
